import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; const ViewWatch = () => { const [watches, setWatches] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { fetchWatches(); }, []); const fetchWatches = async () => { try { const response = await axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:8000/dashboard/api/watch/'); console.log(response.data) setWatches(response.data); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching watches:', error); } }; handleDelete = (itemId) => { axios.delete(`/api/watches/${itemId}`) .then(() => { // Remove item from state or DOM console.log('Item deleted successfully.'); }) .catch((error) => { console.error('Error deleting item:', error); // Handle error (e.g., display message) }); }; return (

Watch View

Watches
{watches.map((watch, index) => (
- {watch.discount} %
{watch.watch_name}
${watch.price} ${watch.actual_price}

))}

); }; export default ViewWatch;
